meanings.definition: A forecast of a person's future based on the relative positions of the stars and planets at the time of their birth.
meanings.sent1: My sister reads her horoscope every morning to see what the day holds for her.
meanings.sent2: I checked my horoscope in the newspaper to see if it mentioned anything about my zodiac sign.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how some people rely on their horoscope to make decisions for the day.
meanings.sent4: Her horoscope seemed to predict a stormy week ahead, and strangely enough, it did rain every day.
meanings.sent5: The accuracy of my horoscope was so surprising that I started believing in astrology.

meanings.definition: A prediction or analysis of a person's character or future based on the positions of celestial bodies.
meanings.sent1: The magazine's horoscope section always has interesting insights about different zodiac signs.
meanings.sent2: She was curious to know what her horoscope said about her personality traits.
meanings.sent3: His horoscope suggested he should avoid conflicts today, but he ended up in an argument anyway.
meanings.sent4: The horoscope for the year ahead painted a picture of success and new opportunities.
meanings.sent5: Reading her horoscope felt like peeking into a crystal ball that revealed secrets about her future.
